status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"sl3k","text":"Collect a coral sample of approximately 1cm3 containing coral tissue, mucus, and skeleton. Use a fresh sample if possible. If not, flash-freeze the sample and keep it at    until processing. Thaw the sample on ice before proceeding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":171,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6vgmn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"","guid":"","id":0}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a5jnm","text":"Weigh and record coral fragment weight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qc7p","text":"Crush the coral sample using a sterile mortar and pestle until the skeleton and tissue fragments are the size of coarse sand. Do not overdo this step. Transfer the fragments, along with the mucus (coral homogenate), to a 2 mL microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"224fu","text":"Suspend sample in   of Artificial Seawater (ASW) and   of sterile glass beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ass2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51j02","text":"Vortex at speed 3 for   to dislodge tissue and mucus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cn3km","text":"* To avoid lysis of bacterial cells, do not vortex the sample at higher speeds or longer durations than described.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"min","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kimq","text":"Pulse-centrifuge the sample (3-5 seconds at  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9stsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3.200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hajd","text":"Collect supernatant and transfer to a clean 15 mL microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42oar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33far","text":"Bring sample up to   with sterile ASW.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebpl3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b51kb","text":"Add   of 10X DNase Buffer and   of DNase 10,000 U/mL for a final concentration of 20 U/mL. Mix by gently inverting the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"89f97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"39C1CBDC48E211EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6ju","text":"Incubate at room temperature for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14cpa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"hours","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4tfb","text":"Stop DNase activity by adding   of 100X EDTA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t3k7","text":"Bring sample volume up to   with sterile ASW.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cfqvd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pnu0","text":"Transfer thesample to a 10 mL syringe and push through an 8.0 µm, 25 mm flat filter, collecting the flowthrough in a clean 15 mL centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74dp","text":"* If the sample clogs the filter, replacing the 8.0 µm filter may be necessary. In this case, pull back on the syringe plunger to recollect the sample in the syringe before transferring it to a new filter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crh4q","text":"* In the case of samples with excessive mucus, you may further dilute the sample with sterile ASW prior to filtering.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4up0r","text":"Transfer flowthrough to an Amicon‱ Ultra-15 Centrifugal Filter Unit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0AA5D04448D811EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d17e1","text":"Add   Buffer T1 and   of Proteinase K from the NucleoSpinⓇ Tissue Kit to the Amicon‱ filter unit.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":57,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5cq66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"885C3B9B48D811EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"co4uh","text":"Rinse one side of the filter with the lysis buffer 3-5 times using a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft1g0","text":"Securely close the Amicon‱ filter unit and incubate for   at  , being sure to place the tube in a position where the rinsed side of the filter remains covered in the Buffer T1 \u0026 Proteinase K mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"370fk","text":"* Some Amicon‱ filter unit lids may not seal properly. Check for leaks before placing in the incubator. Seal with parafilm if necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"35tbf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B24F955A48D811EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"5CD4751148E511EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"hour","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5CD475AE48E511EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B24F955A48D811EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3npj9","text":"Repeat steps 17 and 18 on the other side of the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59nun","text":"Add   Buffer B3 to the Amicon‱ filter unit and vortex to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"p0md","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"210","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"035DBEFB48D911EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"774j5","text":"Incubate for   at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"63uva","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"min","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"70","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rd49","text":"Add   ethanol (100%) to the Amicon‱ filter unit and vortex to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"be7tn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"210","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4355D93D48D911EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b9ki","text":"Proceed with steps 5-7 of the NucleoSpinⓇ Tissue Kit Standard protocol for human or animal tissue and cultured cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":40,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rbn6","text":"On step 8 of the NucleoSpinⓇ Tissue Kit, perform the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2tki","text":"a. Place the NucleoSpinⓇ Tissue Column into a 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube (not provided in kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":23,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92vkq","text":"b. Add   PCR-grade water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1u4l0","text":"c. Incubate at room temperature for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7aded","text":"d. Centrifuge for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7v50r","text":"e. Repeat steps b, c, \u0026 d once, for a final volume of 100 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh95d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"2400A62148E611EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2BACF1CC48E611EE93FC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"22","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"min","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"11000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
